sentences.sContent: The birds breed in northern latitudes.
sentences.sCn: 这些鸟在北纬地区繁殖。

sentences.sContent: ...A teacher deserves wide latitude in selecting the method of grading that best promotes learning in her classroom; that is...

remMethod.val: 和attitude(n. 态度)一起记， 态度有所不同了， 看来有回旋余地； altitude(n. 海拔， 高度)

trans.tranCn: 纬度； 纬度地区； 回旋余地， 自由
trans.tranOther: the distance north or south of the equator(= the imaginary line around the middle of the world ), measured in degrees
